alert.note: Alert for Okanogan (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 15 at 2:17PM PDT until June 16 at 8:30PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR NORTH CASCADES BURN SCAR AREAS IN EFFECT FOR THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding and debris flows caused by excessive rainfall are possible over the Cedar Creek and Cub Creek burn scars. * WHERE...A portion of North Central Washington, including the following county, Okanogan. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 11 AM Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - National Weather Service Meteorologists are forecasting heavy rainfall over the burn scars, which may lead to flash flooding and debris flows. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
